alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 2:59PM MDT until May 27 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... East central Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 259 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beulah, or 12 miles northwest of Spearfish, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Aladdin. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 3. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 199 and 207. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
